item.title: CVE-2018-19012|2024-09-17T04:08:49.934Z -- ics-cert -- dr%26%23195%3B%26%23164%3Bger%20infinity%20delta
item.description: Drager Infinity Delta, Infinity Delta, all versions, Delta XL, all versions, Kappa, all version, and Infinity Explorer C700, all versions. Via a specific dialog it is possible to break out of the kiosk mode and reach the underlying operating system. By breaking out of the kiosk mode, an attacker is able to take control of the operating system.
